name: ENDCHASER
description:
DEMO IS OUT (GET IT DOWN BELOW)!

OST AVAILABLE AT: The ilmutus games bandcamp!

Play as Griffin, the enigmatic invisible detective with special powers, in this homage to the classic RPG Maker indies of yore!

Travel to the whimsical forest town of Blue Slate, where nothing is "ordinary", and help its inhabitants with their problems, as you seek to answer the burning question:

"Why is the world falling apart?"

FEATURING

  •  A catchy soundtrack!
  • Cute and colorful pixel art!
  • Fun characters and dialogue!
  • A powerful atmosphere!
  • Turn-based combat!
  • Award winning (citation needed) card based minigame: DOUBLE DUO!
  • Bret (that's me).

DISCLAIMER: You may encounter one or two bugs that, unfortunately, cannot be fixed due to the engine being used (RPG Maker 2003), all the major stuff has been addressed though and I hope you'll enjoy the demo!
